SEARCH
Package dev.ua.theroer.magicutils.logger

Interface PrefixedLoggerAdapter<P,B extends LogBuilderCore>

Type Parameters:
P - platform audience type (Player, ServerPlayerEntity, etc.)
B - log builder type
public interface PrefixedLoggerAdapter<P,B extends LogBuilderCore>
Shared adapter for prefixed logger wrappers.
